dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "float MixColor = dot(tex(TEXTURE, UV).rgb, vec3(0.299, 0.587, 0.114));&#000a;vec4 blendColor = vec4( 1.2, 1.0, 0.8, 1.0 );&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * vec4(MixColor * blendColor.r, MixColor * blendColor.g, MixColor * blendColor.b, tex(TEXTURE, UV).a);&#000a;"
